definition: shit youth/used satirically against 憤青|愤青 which shares the same sound/see also 憤青|愤青[fen4 qing1]
manure/dung
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)

sentences.english: We dismiss them because they are chavs.
sentences.chinese: 我們無視他們，因爲他們是糞青。

definition: lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to make a fool of oneself
stupid/slow on the uptake
to boast
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: foolish talk/nonsense
lit. 300 silver taels not hidden here (idiom); fig. to reveal what one intends to hide
pinyin: ci3 di4 wu2 yin2 san1 bai3 liang3

definition: (not) a single person/(no) one
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
shouting abuse in the street like a fishwife
overtones in conversation/things indirectly implied from what is said
female gossip/busybody
keenly felt pain/bitter anguish
